mapper.insert: insert into user values ( null, #{name}, #{email}, password(#{password}), #{gender}, current_timestamp(),'USER')
mapper.select: select no,name,gender,email,join_date,role from user where email=#{email} and password=password(#{password})
select no,name,email,gender,join_date,role from user where email= #{value}
mapper.update: update user set name=#{name}, password=password(#{password}),gender=#{gender} where no=#{no}
